name: RonaConstrictor
description:
2022: CV-19 has mutated beyond control, and developed a mind of its own! It hunts humans for the mere sport. Having evolved into an ever growing Leviathan, the virus has pushed mankind to the edge of extinction. The last survivors have all moved underground into hiding in hopes of eluding this deadly new predator. 

As the virus, you must hunt and eat as many survivors as possible. Leave none alive, but beware! the devious humans have built Antisceptic Gel walls to try and destroy you. Avoid them at all costs! or be sanitized....

------------------Credits:------------------------------------

This game was created at the Game Design // UE for the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
